name: Alessandro Puliti
subtitle: Chief Executive Officer at Saipem
about: In over 30 years of work, I have been fortunate enough to have had a professional path marked by a wealth of projects and activities, thanks to which I have achieved important career and personal goals. A long journey that led me, after graduating in Geology, to take on demanding challenges in the energy sector, working directly on the field, in Italy and abroad, in complex scenarios with major companies, first at Agip and then at Eni. It has been a path along which different technical skills have been combined with progressively increasing managerial responsibilities, through which, regardless of role and geographical context, I have gained the valuable awareness of what it means to work in respect and integration of different cultures, people and values.Today, as Chief Executive Officer of Saipem, I lead an outstanding Italian company recognised worldwide for its engineering expertise at the service of energy and infrastructure. A company in which 30,000 colleagues work and are actively involved in over 50 countries on extraordinary projects, with a focus on health and safety, with passion, know-how and technological capabilities backed by more than 65 years of experience and challenges successfully mastered all over the world.  Our aim is to shape the energy transition and to walk alongside our clients on the path to Net Zero. Because we believe that engineering can truly contribute to a sustainable future.
experiences: General Manager e Managing Director Petrobel
